name: The Brothers DAO
description: $BRO is the token of the Kadena Brothers DAO, designed to reward active contributions to Kadena culture. With a total supply of only 100 $BRO, it is a limited-supply token featuring a decentralized governance model and a unique tipping mechanism that incentivizes Kadena Culture Production (KCP). Members earn tips in $BRO by creating original content and engaging with the community. It uses an automated self-pumping mechanism that re-invests DEX fees into the public treasury. To maintain membership in the Kadena Brothers DAO, users must hold at least 0.2 $BRO.
